about_the_game:
Our upcoming games:



Rei's high school life was a failure - he never made a single friend in three years. But suddenly, three months before his graduation, life gives him a chance to change everything, to brighten up the last months of school. But will he accept this gift of fate?

This game features:
  • 10 background arts
  • 10 CGs
  • live2d sprites with various animations and lip-sync
  • voiceovers for every heroine

This is a Japanese-themed visual novel created by indie developers.

Yui


Cheerful and mischievous girl, Rei's classmate. Yui has two little siblings, Sora and Seki, She has to work on two part-time jobs because parent abandoned them when she was 8 years old.

Miya

Shy and timid girl, Yui's best (and only) friend. Her parents are very strict - they don't even let her to get home later than 8 pm.

Eiko

Rei's stepsister. Rei's dad Slava get her from the orphanage house when she already was 11 years old. Because she lived for a long time without parents and family, she became really aggresive. She's always mad at the Rei because he's not popular in the school.

Akira

Hard-working and sincere girl. Rei met her in "Akudevi" - an online mobile game. One day she invited Rei to meet in real life. He thought that Akira is a male, that's why he agreed easily. But she turned out to be a beautiful girl.

Rei

Typical japanese high school student. He likes playing mobile games.
